about_the_game:
Step into the grim and eerie depths of the city sewers, where a catastrophic toxic chemical spill has mutated parasites that attacks the local insects and animals and turning them into bloodthirsty abominations. You, as an employee of T.E.N.A.C, is tasked with navigating the hazardous environment to cleanse it of the toxic chemicals that have transformed animals and insects into vicious mutants.

Survive the Nightmare Below:

In Zooparasite, prepare to face a relentless mutated creatures that will stop at nothing to end your life. Armed with only your wits and a flashlight, you must outmaneuver and outsmart these grotesque monstrosities if you have any hope of making it out alive from the sewers.

Unravel the Mystery:

As you progress deeper into the darkness, uncover the chilling truth behind the chemical spill and the horrifying experiments conducted in the shadows. Beware, for the more you learn, the more sinister the truth becomes.



Key Features:


Terrifying Atmosphere: Experience an intense and immersive horror experience as you navigate the dimly lit and claustrophobic sewers infested with mutated creatures.

Challenging Gameplay: Survive against a variety of deadly mutants that will test your courage, resourcefulness, and quick thinking at every turn.

Exploration and Strategy: Explore the labyrinthine tunnels, scavenge for resources, and plan your every move to outsmart the relentless mutants hunting you down.

Mysterious Narrative: Unravel the dark secrets hidden beneath the city streets and piece together the truth behind the catastrophic events that led to the mutant outbreak.

Immersive Sound Design: Immerse yourself in the horror with spine-chilling sound effects and a haunting soundtrack that will keep you on the edge of your seat.



Are you ready to face the horrors lurking below? Can you survive the nightmare and emerge unscathed, or will you become just another victim of the Parasite?

legal_notice: Game created by Mascot Bro Studio.
name: Zooparasite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2 GB or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Step into the depths of the city sewers, where a catastrophic toxic chemical spill has mutated the local wildlife and insects into bloodthirsty abominations. You are tasked with recording and navigating the hazardous environment to cleanse it of the toxic chemicals that turned creatures into mutants
